statements: DELETE FROM InventoryTracking WHERE item_id = 100 AND current_quantity = 0;
DELETE FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_quantity < reorder_level OR item_name LIKE '%outdated%';
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 101 AND current_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM reorder_processes WHERE reorder_date < '2022-01-01' AND order_quantity >= 20;
DELETE FROM inventory_items WHERE item_id = 5 AND quantity <= 10;
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE product_id = 101 AND order_date < '2021-06-01';
